whatArePTRRecords.title: What are PTR Records?
whatArePTRRecords.content: PTR records provide reverse DNS lookups, mapping IP addresses back to domain names for verification and logging purposes

zoneStructure.title: Zone Structure
zoneStructure.content: IPv4 reverse zones use .in-addr.arpa (e.g., 1.168.192.in-addr.arpa), IPv6 uses .ip6.arpa with nibble boundaries

zoneDelegation.title: Zone Delegation
zoneDelegation.content: Reverse DNS zones must be properly delegated by your ISP or hosting provider to function correctly

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
bestPractices.content: Always set up reverse DNS for mail servers, use descriptive hostnames, and ensure forward/reverse DNS match
